zhuāng
farmstead; village; manor; place of business; banker (in a gambling game); grave or solemn; holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)
усадьба; поселок; усадьба; место ведения бизнеса; банкир (в азартной игре); серьезный или торжественный; владения помещика (в императорском Китае)

humanum_full_description_en:
Inscriptions from the " steroids " from the " mouth ", " valves " sound, is " Zhuang ancient word", the inscriptions as a title of nobility, 𧽙 Hai Ding: "Songzhuang public of Hai Sun 𧽙 from first glance (as) will Ding." Xiaozhuan " Zhuang " from "艸", " Zhuang " sound (" Zhuang " from " Shi ", "爿" sound, indicating that the soldier is strong), "Shu Wen": "Zhuang, taboo. 𤖈, Guwenzhuang."

The word " Zhuang " can mean solemnity and solemnity. "The Analects of Confucius: For Politics": "When you come to the place, you will be respectful." He Yan's collection quoted and quoted Bao Xian as saying: "Being solemn and strict.

" Zhuang " can show respect. "Lu Shichunqiu‧ filial piety": "If you live in dignity, you are not filial." Gao You's note: "Zhuang, respect."

" Zhuang " can also mean decoration. Southern Song Dynasty Yan Yanzhi's "Preface to Qushui Poems on March 3rd": "The beautiful village Zaoye, the Fufu Jianchuan."

" Zhuang " can mean passage. "Twenty-eight years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xianggong": "The wooden hundred cars of the Qing family are in the village."

" Zhuang " can also mean a village or garden. Tang Dufu "Huaijinshuijuzhi": "Wanliqiao West House, Baihuatan Beizhuang."
humanum_short_description_en: Xiaozhuan starts from "艸", " Zhuang " sound (" Zhuang " comes from " Shi ", "爿" sound means the soldier is strong), " Zhuang " means solemn and solemn.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「甾」從「口」，「爿」聲，是「莊」的古字，金文用作諸侯的稱號，𧽙亥鼎：「宋莊公之孫𧽙亥自乍(作)會鼎。」小篆「莊」字從「艸」，「壯」聲(「壯」字從「士」，「爿」聲，表示士兵強壯)，《說文》：「莊，上諱。𤖈，古文莊。」

　　「莊」字可表示莊嚴、嚴正。《論語‧為政》：「臨之以莊則敬。」何晏集解引包咸曰：「莊，嚴也。君臨民以嚴，則民敬其上。」

　　「莊」可表示恭敬。《呂氏春秋‧孝行》：「居處不莊，非孝也。」高誘注：「莊，敬。」

　　「莊」也可表示裝飾。南朝宋顏延之〈三月三日曲水詩序〉：「靚莊藻野，袨服縟川。」

　　「莊」可表示通道。《左傳‧襄公二十八年》：「得慶氏之木百車於莊。」

　　「莊」還可表示村莊、園圃。唐杜甫〈懷錦水居止〉：「萬里橋西宅，百花潭北莊。」
humanum_short_description: 小篆從「艸」，「壯」聲(「壯」字從「士」，「爿」聲，表示士兵強壯)，「莊」字表示莊嚴、嚴正。

Chinese Definition:

  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 壯 [ zhuàng ] big, large; robust, strong; the name of a tribe
①村落，田舍：村莊。莊戶。莊稼。
②封建社會君主、貴族等所佔有的成片土地：皇莊。莊主。莊客。
③商店的一種名稱：茶莊。飯莊。錢莊。
④某些種類的賭博，局中人輪流爲主：莊家。坐莊。
⑤四通八達的道路：康莊大道。
⑥嚴肅，端重：莊嚴。莊重(zhòng)。端莊。
⑦姓氏。

Kind: traditional

金文從「 甾 」從「 口 」，「 爿 」聲，是「 莊 」的古字，金文用作諸侯的稱號，𧽙亥鼎：「宋莊公之孫𧽙亥自乍(作)會鼎。」小篆「 莊 」字從「 艸 」，「 壯 」聲(「 壯 」字從「 士 」，「 爿 」聲，表示士兵強壯)，《說文》：「莊，上諱。𤖈，古文莊。」 「 莊 」字可表示莊嚴、嚴正。《論語‧為政》：「臨之以莊則敬。」何晏集解引包咸曰：「莊，嚴也。君臨民以嚴，則民敬其上。」 「 莊 」可表示恭敬。《呂氏春秋‧孝行》：「居處不莊，非孝也。」高誘注：「莊，敬。」 「 莊 」也可表示裝飾。南朝宋顏延之〈三月三日曲水詩序〉：「靚莊藻野，袨服縟川。」 「 莊 」可表示通道。《左傳‧襄公二十八年》：「得慶氏之木百車於莊。」 「 莊 」還可表示村莊、園圃。唐杜甫〈懷錦水居止〉：「萬里橋西宅，百花潭北莊。」

莊字的基本解释

莊
zhuāng
见“庄”。

莊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuāng］
［《廣韻》側羊切，平陽，莊。］
亦作“庒1”。“庄1”的繁体字。
(1)严肃；庄重。
(2)严正。
(3)恭敬。
(4)装饰。
(5)四通八达的道路。
(6)村庄；郊野的住宅、别墅。
(7)封建时代皇室、贵族、地主、寺院等占有并经营的大片土地。
(8)旧称大商号或专门经营某地区货物的商号。
(9)庄家。
(10)量词。后作“樁”。
(11)姓。战国时有庄周、庄蹻。

莊字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　莊； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1033第22
〔古文〕?????【唐韻】【集韻】?側羊切，音裝。草盛貌。【六書正譌】艸芽之壯也。　又嚴也。【論語】臨之以莊則敬。　又【韻會】盛飾也。　又【左傳·襄二十八年】得慶父之木百車于莊。【註】莊，六軌之道。【爾雅·釋宮】六達謂之莊。　又田舍也。【通鑑·史炤·釋文】唐置莊宅使。【胡三省註】蓋主莊田及外舍之事。　又【公羊傳·定八年】矢著于莊門。【註】莊門，孟氏之門名。　又姓。【通志·氏族略】楚莊王之後，以諡爲氏，楚有大儒曰莊周。　又【雲南通志】海貝一枚，土人謂之莊。　又【篇海】側亮切，音壯。恭也。【說文】作壯。【干祿字書】通作荘。俗作庄，非。

考證：〔【干祿字書】通作莊。〕　謹照原文莊改荘。

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
village
zhuāng
See "Zhuang".
village
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuāng］
["Guangyun" side sheep cut, Pingyang, Zhuang. ]
Also known as "庒1". Traditional characters for "庄1".
(1) Serious; solemn.
(2) Stern.
(3) Respectfully.
(4) Decoration.
(5) Roads extending in all directions.
(6) Villages; houses and villas in the countryside.
(7) Large tracts of land occupied and operated by royal families, nobles, landlords, and temples in the feudal era.
(8) Formerly known as a major firm or a firm that specializes in goods in a certain area.
(9) Banker.
(10) Quantifiers. Later as a "pile".
(11) Last name. During the Warring States Period, there were Zhuang Zhou and Zhuang Zhu.
village

[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zhuang Zi] 　 Zhuang; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1033 22
[Ancient text]????? [Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] Sheep cut on the side, sound loaded. The grass is magnificent. 【Liushuzhengzhen】The strength of Jiaoya.　It's also strict. [The Analects of Confucius] Zhuang Zhuang Ze Jing.　[Rhyme Club] Sheng is also decorated.　[Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Twenty-eight Years] To celebrate his father's wooden hundred cars in Yuzhuang. [Note] Zhuang, the six-track way. 【Erya·Shigong】Liu Da is a great village.　There are also farm houses. 【Tong Jian·Shi Zhuang·Explanation】Tang Zhuang Zhuang Zhuang Shi. [Note from Hu Sanxing] The matter of covering the main Zhuangtian and Waishe.　[Gongyangzhuan·Ding eight years] is aimed at Zhuangmen. [Note] Zhuangmen, the name of the Meng family.　Another last name. [General History·Clan Profile] After the king of Chuzhuang, the posthumous posthumous clan was called Zhuang Zhou.　[Yunnan Tongzhi] A sea shell, which is called a village by the natives.　[Pianhai] The side is bright and cut, and the sound is strong. Christine. 【Said Wen】Be strong. 【Qianlu Zishu】Tong Zuo. Vulgar, non-. Textual research: [[The Book of Dry Lu Characters] Tong Zuozhuang. 〕　I would like to follow the original Zhuang Gai-so.
